title: Once Upon A Time in Northern Ireland
description: 25 years on from the end of the Troubles, those who lived through it share intimate, unheard testimonies - and reflect on its legacy.

episodes.url: Documentary/Once Upon A Time/Northern Ireland/1. Once Upon a Time in Northern Ireland, Series 1, It Wasn’t Like a Movie Anymore [p0ff7cry].mp4
episodes.title: It Wasn't Like A Movie Anymore
episodes.description: When tensions between Protestants and Catholics explode, the British Army is deployed.

episodes.url: Documentary/Once Upon A Time/Northern Ireland/2. Once Upon a Time in Northern Ireland, Series 1, Do Paramilitaries Lie Awake at Night？ [p0fhvvky].mp4
episodes.title: Do Paramilitaries Lie Awake At Night?
episodes.description: A deeply segregated society emerges as the violence escalates.

episodes.url: Documentary/Once Upon A Time/Northern Ireland/3. Once Upon a Time in Northern Ireland, Series 1, So Many Broken Hearts [p0fsgkhk].mp4
episodes.title: So Many Broken Hearts
episodes.description: The impact of the hunger strikes is seen through the eyes of three women.

episodes.url: Documentary/Once Upon A Time/Northern Ireland/4. Once Upon a Time in Northern Ireland, Series 1, Loose Talk Costs Lives [p0fhvz1p].mp4
episodes.title: Loose Talk Costs Lives
episodes.description: Tensions rise as the police and army infiltrate paramilitary organisations.

episodes.url: Documentary/Once Upon A Time/Northern Ireland/5. Once Upon a Time in Northern Ireland, Series 1, Who Wants to Live Like That [p0fhvzbv].mp4
episodes.title: Who Wants to Live Like That?
episodes.description: After decades of violence, a breakthrough is reached. But at what cost?
